annotations.description: Real world versions of drinks from Skyrim, as served by Talen-Jei at the Bee and the Barb in Riften! I used to be an adventurer, like you, but then I took an...
annotations.title: Drinks from Skyrim | How to Drink

textContent:
.5 oz. -or- 15 ml. cinnamon syrup
.25 oz. -or- 8 ml. bénédictine
.5 oz. -or- 15 ml. ancho reyes chile liqueur
1.5 oz. -or- 45 ml. cognac

stir & strain into old fashioned glass.
garnish with lemon twist

title: Cliff Racer
